name: Namazu's Revenge
description:
!!!! You have to change the name of the executable file from "Namazu´s Revenge" to "Absorb" for it to run !!!!!

xoxo

------

You are Namazu, for years everyone has tried to capture you inside a gourd, but now it is time for REVENGE! 

You are equiped with five souls, when you finish shooting them, your gourd will start absorbing everything around you (including enemies, be careful!).

CONTROLS: 

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Point and shoot

---------

Music: Lorenzo Machuca

Programming: Ronia

Graphics: Chimuela
